info.name: Adapted Aarakocra
info.description: Adapted Aarakocra race for the Alfallen races from The Compendium of Forgotten Secrets.
info.author: DA3monking

description.p: A rarity in the of the alfallen races, the Aarakocra is met with both fear and wonder. the influence of the Alrisen has almost as much effect on them as a Dragonborn, possibly changing the form to an almost human apearance, and while the wings tend to remain, the feathers may not.
You are proficient in unarmed strikes, with your claws granting you 1d4 slashing damage, and you have a flight speed of 50 feet. Your base walking speed is 25 feet, and your size is Medium.
